name: Checklist
description: Create a task list or checklist for any purpose
author: Frame Team

fields.name: summary
fields.label: Description
fields.placeholder: Context or purpose of this checklist

template:
---
title: "{title}"
summary: "{summary}"
tags: [{tags}]
contentType: checklist
priority: {priority}
dueDate: {dueDate}
---

# {title}

{summary}

## Tasks

### High Priority

- [ ] Critical task 1
- [ ] Critical task 2

### Medium Priority

- [ ] Standard task 1
- [ ] Standard task 2

### Low Priority

- [ ] Nice to have 1
- [ ] Nice to have 2

## Notes

Additional context or reminders...

## Completion Criteria

What defines "done" for this checklist?
